results.content: It is one of the best courses for AWS SAA, After trying with many instructors in Udemy, I found Chandra's course on AWS SAA is master piece, Course consists of real time scenarios with Labs, It is recommended to every students who are aspiring to be AWS SAA, Further in the explanations or crisp with deep explanations, Most importantly he is not in hurry while teaching each topic, It is amazing course, I am taking exam in September 30th 2022
